title: ENDS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE
description: Returns TRUE if the provided string ends with any of the specified compare_strings. The comparison is case-insensitive. Otherwise, returns FALSE.

parameters.name: â€¦ compare_strings
parameters.description: One or more strings to compare against the end of the source string.

examples:
ENDS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE(Email, ".gov", ".edu")
-- Returns TRUE if Email ends with ".gov" or ".edu" in any case; otherwise, returns FALSE.
